mapper.select: SELECT e.* FROM `${table}` e WHERE (e.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')) AND e.`object_id` = #{id}

sql.if: AND e.`parent_entity_id` = (SELECT ent.`id` FROM `entity` ent WHERE ent.`entity_table` = #{parentEntity}) AND e.`parent_id` = #{parentId}

mapper.sql: SELECT e.* FROM `${table}` e WHERE e.`object_id` = #{id} AND e.`start_date` = ( SELECT MAX(e1.`start_date`) FROM `${table}` e1 WHERE e1.`object_id` = #{id} AND e1.`start_date` <= #{startDate})
